verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician בִּנְגִינ֗וֹת <WH5058> on Neginoth מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David בְּקָרְאִ֡י <WH7121> me when I call עֲנֵ֤נִי ׀ <WH6030> Hear אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <WH430> O God צִדְקִ֗י <WH6664> of my righteousness בַּ֭צָּר <WH6862> me [when I was] in distress הִרְחַ֣בְתָּ <WH7337> thou hast enlarged לִּ֑י חָ֝נֵּ֗נִי <WH2603> have mercy וּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> upon me and hear תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃ <WH8605> my prayer

בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> O ye sons אִ֡ישׁ <WH376> of men עַד־ <WH5704> how long מֶ֬ה <WH4100> how כְבוֹדִ֣י <WH3519> [will ye turn] my glory לִ֭כְלִמָּה <WH3639> confusion תֶּאֱהָב֣וּן <WH157> love רִ֑יק <WH7385> vanity תְּבַקְשׁ֖וּ <WH1245> [and] seek כָזָ֣ב <WH3577> deceitful סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

וּדְע֗וּ <WH3045> But know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִפְלָ֣ה <WH6395> hath set apart יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> that the LORD חָסִ֣יד <WH2623> him that is godly ל֑וֹ יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> for himself the LORD יִ֝שְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> will hear בְּקָרְאִ֥י <WH7121> when I call אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> about

רִגְז֗וּ <WH7264> Stand in awe וְֽאַל־ <WH408> not תֶּ֫חֱטָ֥אוּ <WH2398> and sin אִמְר֣וּ <WH559> not commune בִ֭לְבַבְכֶם <WH3824> with your own heart עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon מִשְׁכַּבְכֶ֗ם <WH4904> upon your bed וְדֹ֣מּוּ <WH1826> and be still סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
זִבְח֥וּ <WH2076> Offer זִבְחֵי־ <WH2077> the sacrifices צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> of righteousness וּ֝בִטְח֗וּ <WH982> and put your trust אֶל־ <WH413> in יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> in the LORD

רַבִּ֥ים <WH7227> [There be] many אֹמְרִים֮ <WH559> that say מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who יַרְאֵ֪נוּ֫ <WH7200> Who will shew ט֥וֹב <WH2896> good נְֽסָה־ <WH5375> lift thou up עָ֭לֵינוּ <WH5921> up א֨וֹר <WH216> the light פָּנֶ֬יךָ <WH6440> of thy countenance יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> LORD

נָתַ֣תָּה <WH5414> Thou hast put שִׂמְחָ֣ה <WH8057> gladness בְלִבִּ֑י <WH3820> in my heart מֵעֵ֬ת <WH6256> more than in the time דְּגָנָ֖ם <WH1715> [that] their corn וְתִֽירוֹשָׁ֣ם <WH8492> and their wine רָֽבּוּ׃ <WH7231> increased

בְּשָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> in peace יַחְדָּו֮ <WH3162> I will both אֶשְׁכְּבָ֪ה <WH7901> lay me down וְאִ֫ישָׁ֥ן <WH3462> and sleep כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> O יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> for thou LORD לְבָדָ֑ד <WH910> only לָ֝בֶ֗טַח <WH983> in safety תּוֹשִׁיבֵֽנִי׃ <WH3427> makest me dwell
